::Aerotaur::
        He nods slowly.  "It's me Windlord.  I just got a repaint while I was guarding Blackstorm... er... Nightlight..."  He shudders and staggers to his feet, "Can we talk inside where I can sit?"


I dont really care if I'm not normal... so long as I'm abnormal within the normal range of abnormality.
